title: Mastitus: disease of the udder
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Evelyn Cherry and Lawrence Cherry
brief_description: An account of the causes, symptoms, prevention and cure of three types of mastitis in cattle: Acute, chronic and summer. The film illustrates common practices that contribute to the spread of the disease and demonstrates practical tests and treatment. The advantages of veterinary and clinical analysis and treatment are stressed.
